topic.body:
https://github.com/mnagel/clustergit

Unlike [its](https://myrepos.branchable.com/) [alternatives](https://github.com/capr/multigit), there is no need to register the repo.

1_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR.body:
Features:

- no configuration required
- Python 2 and Python 3
- syntax highlighting
- Git Smart HTTP support
- code navigation using Exuberant ctags
- markup (markdown & ReStructuredText) rendering

2_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR.body:
Besides server, it is also a good desktop OS if:

0. You are tired of systemd propagating into most mainstream Linux distributions.
1. Your hardware is not new.
2. You do not use any Linux specific applications.

3_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR.body:
Available for desktops (Windows 7+, macOS, Linux) and mobiles (iOS, Android).
I use it on iOS & Android.

14_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR.body:
It supports HTTP/HTTPS, FTP, SFTP, BitTorrent and Metalink.
It has built-in JSON-RPC and XML-RPC interfaces.

1_171fhZp8nPaJTLfTnov3hSQE8pweTcf6wC.body: It's a tiny OS offering a LISP like shell within browser.

1_12yaKkoqVKBUi66uB5pYXamWguKFaWdDnx.body: There is an open source alternative [syncthing](https://github.com/syncthing/syncthing). However, if you want to sync with iOS devices or publicly with lots of people, BTSync is the only choice.

1_19SbSoytV8aD6GtpJi9F6RDSnGzunYgYzo.body:
Dat deduplicats data between versions.

Dat nodes discovery each other via DNS(including mDNS) and DHT.

23_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR.body: entr works on BSD, Mac OS, and Linux. It is an alternative to inotifywait, which only works on Linux.

1_1GNdkBSxTw6SpRdGHxDCyfANXnwi7FG7rJ.body: I also use a warm temperature, except viewing photos and videos.

2_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: At the first glance, I feel it looks like the old Opera (before webkit/Blink). Then I googled it and found out it is launched by ex opera CEO. ;-)

2_1JHQA9oFkFpFFRiscyT4N71AKLWg46pQ92.body: Improves security on anti buffer overflow vulnerabilities.

6_1JHQA9oFkFpFFRiscyT4N71AKLWg46pQ92.body: OnionShare starts an onion httpd. Files can be uploaded and downloaded via web UI.

7_1JHQA9oFkFpFFRiscyT4N71AKLWg46pQ92.body: Development seems slow. Latest release is at 2014 and previous release 2009.

39_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR.body:
For tiny Java programs, [avian with Android class path](https://github.com/bigfatbrowncat/avian-pack) reduces 50% memory usage, competible with nodejs. And [avian with its own subset of Java class path](readytalk.github.io/avian-web/javadoc-1.2.0/index.html) reduces 90% memory usage.

avian also supports to AOT-compile Java code to a boot image.

2_18cSYDgTfMB255SDgQM9EuoyWu78MhWfNj.body: It is a manager of KVM & Linux containers.
